name: javaCast
description: Converts the data type of a CFML variable to pass as an argument to an overloaded method of a Java object.

params.name: type
params.description: The name of a Java primitive or a Java class name.

params.name: variable
params.description: A variable, Java object or array.

coldfusion.notes: CF7+ Added null. CF8+ added bigdecimal, byte, char, short and for casting arrays.

examples.title: Convert a ColdFusion Number to a Java double primitive
examples.description: Converts the number 180.0 degrees to radians using Java method: Math.toRadians(double degrees)
